author: Jim Vejvoda
title: Netflix Is More Valuable Than Disney (For Now)
description: Shares of Netflix hit an all-time high on April 15, boosting the company's value over that of rival Disney, which is deeply struggling amidst the ongoing coronavirus pandemic.
content: Shares of Netflix hit an all-time high on April 15, boosting the company's value over that of rival Disney, which is deeply struggling amidst the ongoing coronavirus pandemic.As reported by Variety, Netflix's stock "closed up 3.2%, to $426.75 per share. That … [+952 chars]
